verbs.description: [ARG1: Mr. Trump ’s decision] , while [ARGM-TMP: long] [V: anticipated] and widely telegraphed , plunges America ’s relations with European allies into deep uncertainty .
[ARG1: Mr. Trump ’s decision] , while long anticipated and [ARGM-ADV: widely] [V: telegraphed] , plunges America ’s relations with European allies into deep uncertainty .
